name: Space Trucking
description:
Requires Controller

In this game you take control of a small mining space ship. Go around and collect ores. Sell ores at the Space Station or use them to upgrade your ship. When you run out of asteroids to mine or just if you're looking for some new stuff, head to a warp point to travel to the next asteroid field. Be careful though, space has no brakes and there are dangers you can only find out there.

Credits:

Menu Music: https://www.bensound.com/
Warning Sound: http://soundbible.com/878-Martian-Scanner.html
Ship Damage Sound: http://soundbible.com/336-Pin-Or-Ting-Metal-Plate.html
Tractor Beam Sound: http://soundbible.com/1744-Shooting-Star.html
Thrust Sound(Quiet): https://soundbible.com/1492-Rocket-Thrusters.html
Planet Texture Generator: http://www.texturesforplanets.com/

If I missed a credit tell me and I'll update it.
